name: Julie's Sweets
description: Julie's Sweets is story driven time management game featuring 60 story and 18 pure challenge levels. Delicious donuts, cupcakes and pies - make them quick and time flys.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card Storage: 210 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 - Update 1803 Processor: Intel i5 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card Storage: 210 MB available space
